mapper.update: update FDA_MONITOR_VAL_RAIN set MONITOR_SPOT_ID = #{monitorSpotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_RECORD_ID = #{monitorRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RAIN_INTENSITY = #{rainIntensity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RAIN_INTENSITY_NATURE = #{rainIntensityNature,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RAIN_INTENSITY_FDA = #{rainIntensityFda,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, MONITOR_SPOT_ID, MONITOR_RECORD_ID, RAIN_INTENSITY, RAIN_INTENSITY_NATURE, RAIN_INTENSITY_FDA, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from FDA_MONITOR_VAL_RAIN where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, MONITOR_SPOT_ID, MONITOR_RECORD_ID, RAIN_INTENSITY, RAIN_INTENSITY_NATURE, RAIN_INTENSITY_FDA, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from FDA_MONITOR_VAL_RAIN
